name: For The Gods (FYP)
description:
Test your skills in this exciting boss battle! Inspired by the souls series, try and get the fastest time to take down the boss with the limited tools you posses. Take a screenshot and share it with us here!

This is a game made for my Final Year Project for the KDU Game Development course in Malaysia.

This is made with a team of duos in Unreal Engine 4
Desmond Pang: Programmer
Baxter Rhodneyson: Designer

All models and sounds used are free Infinity Blade assets available in the Unreal store.

Soundtracks are taken from Child of Light which is a property of Ubisoft
